Class Fluid

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.ethz.inspire.emod.model.fluid.Fluid

extends java.lang.Object
    Implements various models for fluids

        public static double convectionFreePlateVert(Material mf,
                             double Tb,
                             double Tf,
                             double h)
        Calculates the htc on a horizontal plate assuming free convection
        Parameters:
        mf - Type of the fluid Material.java
        Tb - Temperature of the body (plate) [K]
        Tf - Temperature of the fluid (bulk) [K]
        h - Height of the plate [m]
        Returns:
        calculated htc [W/m2/K]

      • convectionFreePlateHorz

        public static double convectionFreePlateHorz(Material mf,
                             double Tb,
                             double Tf,
                             double l,
                             boolean fluidOnTop)
        Calculates the htc on a horizontal plate assuming free convection
        Parameters:
        mf - Type of the fluid Material.java
        Tb - Temperature of the body (plate) [K]
        Tf - Temperature of the fluid (bulk) [K]
        l - Length of the plate [m]
        fluidOnTop - is true, if the fluid is on top of the plate
        Returns:
        calculated htc [W/m2/K]

        public static double rayleightNumber(double beta,
                     double nu,
                     double cp,
                     double eta,
                     double lambda,
                     double dT,
                     double d)
        Rayleight Number
        Parameters:
        beta - Thermal expansion coeff. [1/K]
        nu - Kin. viscosity [m2/s]

        eta - Dyn. viscosity [Pa s]
        lambda - Specific heat transfer coeff. [W/m/K]
        dT - Temperature difference [K]
